Text.Page:
You must indeed be the sun's chosen champion.

The greatest mysteries of the temple are hidden from illumination within ancient urns. Release the dimensional mirror from within one of the jars, then you must face {@LinkCreature:425#8005}.

The sun itself has chosen you as its champion.

The god Balder placed {@LinkCreature:425#8005} to stand against any who would unjustly seek the temple's ultimate blessing.

Balder also offers tribute to your courage in the form of a peerless gift.

May the titans, Arun and Shara, hold you forever within their dream.
